coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription printed on the packaging reads 'Packed by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Pâté and Crackers
coreAttributes.description: A small tin of meat pâté and crackers wrapped in a wax paper package. The label on package is a cartoony depiction a smiling gryphon-boy with crumbs all around his beak.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/5)] [##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM)/5)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel stronger and more alert...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 1)]

The tin makes a slight hiss as air rushes in. [npc.speech(Nice hiss,)] [npc.she] [npc.verb(comment)]. #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unpack)] the crackers and [npc.verb(open)] the tin. #ENDIF [npc.She] [npc.verb(breathe)] in the hearty scent of crackers just out of the oven and freshly cooked meat.
